newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: PRESS DIGEST - Sri Lanka Newspapers - September 4.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Sri Lanka Newspapers - September 4.

text.p: Following are some of the main stories in Wednesday's Sri Lankan newspapers.
The military says Tamil rebel responsible for July train bombing in Colombo suburb arrested.
Aravinda de Silva powers Sri Lanka to the Singer World Series cricket final.
Bus crash kills 19, wounds more than 40 in southeastern Sri Lanka.
Customs arrest Polish national for trying to smuggle into Sri Lanka 10 kilos of gold biscuits.
Joint operation by army and police net suspect in July train bombing in Colombo suburb.
Government members of parliament complain of high cost of living.
